game.name: MythBeasts
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Welcome to the world of Mythbeasts, an ambitious creature collection RPG that I'm developing completely solo as an autistic indie developer. Explore this huge world with endless progression and leveling for your mythbeasts
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to the world of Mythbeasts, an ambitious creature collection RPG that I'm developing completely solo as an autistic indie developer. Explore this huge world with endless progression and leveling for your mythbeasts
